alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 4:43AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS LATE THIS EVENING ALONG THE ANCHORAGE HILLSIDE... A potent, fall-like storm will move towards the area today. Winds will steadily increase through the day. Sustained winds along the Hillside and higher elevations should reach 30-40 mph by this evening. The strongest gusts will be around 55 mph from early through late evening. For the rest of the Anchorage Bowl, winds will only be between 10-15 mph out of the north. Please take time to prepare and secure any loose objects that may be blown around. Given that many trees still have their leaves and how wet the ground is after recent rainfall, there is an outside chance of tree damage. There is still some uncertainty in exactly how strong the highest winds will be, so interested parties should continue to monitor the forecast.
